titles: Antichristianism reproved, and the doctrine of Christ and his apostles justified against swearing in answer to John Tombe's six propositions for the lawfulness of swearing : all which propositions are both against Christ and his apostles doctrine, as is here proved according to the Scriptures ... / by Richard Hubberthorn.
author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.
notes: Reproduction of original in British Library.
keywords: Tombes, John, 1603?-1676. --  Serious consideration of the oath of the king's supremacy.
